local_intent: Perceive and align, then compute a pinch grasp pose for the drawer handle and expose it as handle_grasp
assumptions: Handle is within view and reachable
Alignment tolerance 0.01 is sufficient for grasp planning
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence up to and including ComputeGraspPose with identical targets, strategy, and key; uses only allowed node types and binned port values to realize the verify-phase micro-goal.
